preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This guide provides reference to the features of &clsql;. The first chapter provides an introduction to &clsql; and installation instructions. Following that chapter is the reference section for all user accessible symbols of &clsql; with examples of usage, followed by the reference section for all accessible symbols of the database back-end interface. At the end there you will find a glossary of commonly used terms with their definitions.
